JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle:
We are looking for extraordinary cleaning assistants! 
Are you extraordinary?
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Very Clean is an organic cleaning company servicing families and businesses in Odense. Our mission is to educate people about the contents of standard harmful and toxic cleaning products and why it’s so important to adopt organic variants instead.

+ we absolutely loooooooooove to clean.

Are you a cleaning person?

Do you feel good when you help other people improve their life?

Do you have a passion for a natural & organic lifestyle?

Then maybe you are the new colleague we are looking for

We also believe that to clean like a pro can be learned, but it’s imperative to have a great attitude and be willing to learn our methods.

This means it's you who we are looking for only if:

  • You enjoy cleaning
  • You are kind, friendly, energetic, self motivated, reliable and trustworthy
  • You know how to manage your time effectively
  • You are comfortable working alone and you don’t need supervision in order to deliver the desired results
  • You speak good English (speaking Danish is not mandatory but it's a plus)

More info about the job:

  • This is not a hard job, but keep in mind that it is a physical job
  • This is a part-time job and it will start with min 3h/day
  • Working time: Monday-Friday, from 8 to 15-16 o’clock
  • You will be helping private home owners, who need help with cleaning weekly or every two weeks
  • Servicing homes involves some commuting from one home to another. However, we will always group multiple clients in the same neighbourhood during a work day. Transportation is not included.
  • Products and tools will be provided.

If you believe that this is a job that fits your character, please apply by sending a CV & cover letter to info@veryclean.dk or give us a call at 52 72 02 02.

details.FormattedPurpose:
Very Clean is an organic cleaning company servicing families and businesses in Odense. Our mission is to educate people about the contents of standard harmful and toxic cleaning products and why it’s so important to adopt organic variants instead.

+ we absolutely loooooooooove to clean.

Are you a cleaning person?

Do you feel good when you help other people improve their life?

Do you have a passion for a natural & organic lifestyle?

Then maybe you are the new colleague we are looking for

We also believe that to clean like a pro can be learned, but it’s imperative to have a great attitude and be willing to learn our methods.

This means it's you who we are looking for only if:

  • You enjoy cleaning
  • You are kind, friendly, energetic, self motivated, reliable and trustworthy
  • You know how to manage your time effectively
  • You are comfortable working alone and you don’t need supervision in order to deliver the desired results
  • You speak good English (speaking Danish is not mandatory but it's a plus)

More info about the job:

  • This is not a hard job, but keep in mind that it is a physical job
  • This is a part-time job and it will start with min 3h/day
  • Working time: Monday-Friday, from 8 to 15-16 o’clock
  • You will be helping private home owners, who need help with cleaning weekly or every two weeks
  • Servicing homes involves some commuting from one home to another. However, we will always group multiple clients in the same neighbourhood during a work day. Transportation is not included.
  • Products and tools will be provided.

If you believe that this is a job that fits your character, please apply by sending a CV & cover letter to info@veryclean.dk or give us a call at 52 72 02 02.
